condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Virtualization_Platform_Options)*>,Premium Platform for Nutanix),[NEQ](<*VALUE(MIgration_Scope_Choices)*>,LABOR),[GT](<* Eval(<*VALUE(Number of Nutanix Standard Clusters in the network)*> + <*VALUE(No of Nutanix Single Node Clusters in the network)*>) *>,0))
name: Part_EP_PKSVMP_Nutanix
action: <* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(Virtualization_BOM_Parts:EP-PKSVMP)*><*SETATVQTY(Virtualization_BOM_Parts:EP-PKSVMP,<* Eval(<*VALUE(Number of Nutanix Standard Clusters in the network)*> + <*VALUE(No of Nutanix Single Node Clusters in the network)*>) *>)*><* DoResetAtt *>
